_c = Players;

function nextFiveGames(fixData, teamNameShort) {
  let fixList = [];

  for (const fixId in fixData) {
    const fix = fixData[fixId];

    if (!fix['finished'] && (fix['short_name_h'] === teamNameShort || fix['short_name_a'] === teamNameShort)) {
      if (fix['short_name_h'] === teamNameShort) {
        fixList.push([fix['gameweek'], fix['short_name_a'], fix['team_h_difficulty'], 'h']);
      }

      if (fix['short_name_a'] === teamNameShort) {
        fixList.push([fix['gameweek'], fix['short_name_h'], fix['team_a_difficulty'], 'a']);
      }

      if (fixList.length === 5) {
        return fixList;
      }
    }
  }

  return fixList;
}
/* Sets the theme of the page
* @param: primeColor - backgroundcolor of header and counter
* @param: secondaryColor - backgroundcolor of menu
*/


function setTheme(primeColor, secondaryColor) {
  const header = document.getElementById('header');
  header.style.backgroundColor = primeColor;
  const counter = document.getElementById('counter');
  counter.style.backgroundColor = primeColor;
  const menu = document.getElementById('menu');
  menu.style.backgroundColor = secondaryColor;
}

export default Players;

var _c;

$RefreshReg$(_c, "Players");

function nextFiveGames(fixData, teamNameShort) {
    let fixList = []
    for (const fixId in fixData) {
        const fix = fixData[fixId]
        if (!fix['finished'] && ( fix['short_name_h'] === teamNameShort || fix['short_name_a'] === teamNameShort ) ) {
            if ( fix['short_name_h'] === teamNameShort ) {
                fixList.push([fix['gameweek'], fix['short_name_a'], fix['team_h_difficulty'], 'h'])
            }
            if ( fix['short_name_a'] === teamNameShort ) {
                fixList.push([fix['gameweek'], fix['short_name_h'], fix['team_a_difficulty'], 'a'])
            }
            if (fixList.length === 5) {
                return fixList;
            }
        }
    }
    return fixList;
}



/* Sets the theme of the page
* @param: primeColor - backgroundcolor of header and counter
* @param: secondaryColor - backgroundcolor of menu
*/
function setTheme(primeColor, secondaryColor) {
    const header = document.getElementById('header');
    header.style.backgroundColor = primeColor;

    const counter = document.getElementById('counter');
    counter.style.backgroundColor = primeColor;

    const menu = document.getElementById('menu');
    menu.style.backgroundColor = secondaryColor;
}


export default Players;
